Package alix.lucene.analysis

Class TokenFlagFilter

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.util.AttributeSource
org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenStream
org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenFilter
org.apache.lucene.analysis.FilteringTokenFilter
alix.lucene.analysis.TokenFlagFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class TokenFlagFilter
extends FilteringTokenFilter
A token Filter selecting tokens by flag values. The set of selected int values is efficiently given by a BitSet. See Tag.TagFilter.bits() for an example of such filter, providing codes for part-of-speech. Positions with holes are kept.
